There are plenty of great deals this year for Cyber Monday and major streaming platforms, like Sling TV, are also getting in on the action.

Amazon Prime Video members can get a number of great services—including ViacomCBS's Paramount+, Discovery+, Showtime and more—as add-on channels for just 99 cents a month right now. Amazon Music Unlimited subscribers can get a killer deal on Disney+, and Hulu is offering a full year of access for just 99 cents a month (a savings of $72). Keep in mind that some of these offers may only apply for new subscribers.

Tackle your holiday shopping with deals and expert advice delivered straight to your phone. Sign up for text message alerts from the deal-hunting team at Reviewed.

Whether you're a movie buff, a parent, a romcom fan or just an omnivorous TV hound looking for your next favorite show, these are the best deals you can get on streaming for Cyber Monday 2021.

The best Black Friday streaming deals 

  • Discovery+: 99 cents a month for three months.  Amazon Prime Video subscribers can also get Discovery+ as an add-on channel for 99 cents per month for two months.
     
  • Disney+: 6 free months with Amazon Music. Sign up for Amazon Music Unlimited and get 6 free months of Disney Plus. Amazon Music Unlimited costs $7.99 per month and gives you access to 70 million songs. This only applies to new subscribers, but current or former Amazon Music subscribers can still get three free months of Disney Plus.
     
  • Hulu: 99 cents a month for a year ($72 in savings).  Disney is offering an unbeatable value with Hulu this Black Friday; you'll find no end of great shows to binge here, along with a solid movie selection on par with similar services.
     
  • Sling TV: Buy one month, get one free. If you buy one month of Sling TV, you can get your second month free on any of its streaming tiers, including the Blue, Orange and Orange & Blue plans.
     
  • Starz and Showtime: 99 cents a month through Amazon:  Right now, Prime Video subscribers can get Starz or Showtime as an add-on channel for just 99 cents a month.
     
  • Paramount+: one month of Paramount+ Premium for free. Normally, a month of Paramount+ Premium would cost $9.99. If you're an Amazon Prime Video subscriber, you can also get two months of Paramount+ for just 99 cents a month.
     
  • AMC+:  If you're willing to sign up for a yearly plan with AMC+, you can save 70% on your subscription right now. Normally, a year's subscription would cost $83.88, but this discount brings it down to $23.88 for the whole year.

There's more where this deal came from. Sign up for Reviewed's Perks and Rec newsletter and we'll keep 'em coming every Sunday through Friday.

Prices were accurate at the time this article was published but may change over time.
